description: The project enables the assessment of capacity needs and analyzes national priorities to implement the major environmental conventions on biodiversity, climate change and land degradation.

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Through assessments and analyses undertaken through this project, Fiji will be able to identify how best to mobilize and allocate resources to implement the major environmental conventions—UNFCCC, the UN Convention on Biological Diversity (UNCBD), and the UN Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD)—in a coordinated and cost-effective manner.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Fiji NCSA

title: FIJI National Capacity Self Assessment (NCSA)
